In England, in the seven days to 17 October, there were 263,713 new confirmed cases (466.3 new cases per 100,000). In the seven days to 10 October, there were 217,378 new cases and so the new cases have risen by 21% (46,335 extra cases). The number of confirmed COVID-19 cases in England so far as at 22 October is 7,388,884 (13,066.1 cases per 100,000 population).
